title: Outlook: Bookings with me
description:
'Bookings
with me', is a streamlined personal version of Microsoft Bookings that serves
as a personal scheduling page that integrates with the free/busy information
from your Outlook calendar. We'll be removing the "preview" tag and
making it generally available. Bookings with me will be available in Outlook on
the web and the new Outlook for Windows. Â
